issue.title: LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord exception
issue.body:
When using Event Store as a Kubernetes pod in minikube, after a restart of the Pod the Event Store fails to startup because of this exception:

```
[00001,01,16:30:04.710] Quorum size set to 1
[00001,01,16:30:04.719] Cannot find plugins path: plugins
[00001,01,16:30:04.791] INSTANCE ID:              3564d7ba-a6d9-4f5e-b130-9182fec1a071
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] DATABASE:                 /var/lib/eventstore/data
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] WRITER CHECKPOINT:        358909 (0x579FD)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] CHASER CHECKPOINT:        358909 (0x579FD)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] EPOCH CHECKPOINT:         342764 (0x53AEC)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] TRUNCATE CHECKPOINT:      -1 (0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)
[00001,01,16:30:05.025] MessageHierarchy initialization took 00:00:00.1860183.
[00001,01,16:30:05.142] Opened ongoing /var/lib/eventstore/data/chunk-000000.000000 as version 3
[00001,01,16:30:05.162] CACHED TFChunk #0-0 (chunk-000000.000000) in 00:00:00.0069081.
[00001,01,16:30:05.210] Unhandled exception while starting application:
LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
[00001,01,16:30:05.219] LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
```

Is the database corrupt? If so how can I repair it? And how can I prevent this issue?

I am using version 4.0.3.0 of the eventstore/eventstore:latest docker image.

issue.title: LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord exception
issue.body:
When using Event Store as a Kubernetes pod in minikube, after a restart of the Pod the Event Store fails to startup because of this exception:

```
[00001,01,16:30:04.710] Quorum size set to 1
[00001,01,16:30:04.719] Cannot find plugins path: plugins
[00001,01,16:30:04.791] INSTANCE ID:              3564d7ba-a6d9-4f5e-b130-9182fec1a071
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] DATABASE:                 /var/lib/eventstore/data
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] WRITER CHECKPOINT:        358909 (0x579FD)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] CHASER CHECKPOINT:        358909 (0x579FD)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] EPOCH CHECKPOINT:         342764 (0x53AEC)
[00001,01,16:30:04.792] TRUNCATE CHECKPOINT:      -1 (0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)
[00001,01,16:30:05.025] MessageHierarchy initialization took 00:00:00.1860183.
[00001,01,16:30:05.142] Opened ongoing /var/lib/eventstore/data/chunk-000000.000000 as version 3
[00001,01,16:30:05.162] CACHED TFChunk #0-0 (chunk-000000.000000) in 00:00:00.0069081.
[00001,01,16:30:05.210] Unhandled exception while starting application:
LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
[00001,01,16:30:05.219] LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
LogRecord is not SystemLogRecord: LogPosition: 342764, Flags: SingleWrite, IsCommitted, IsJson, TransactionPosition: 342764, TransactionOffset: 0, ExpectedVersion: 16, EventStreamId: $stats-0.0.0.0:32114, EventId: 4b730791-5652-4e07-9150-999da973e7fe, CorrelationId: d9030e65-30d4-46d1-a528-b391eb7b848a, TimeStamp: 11/29/2017 16:26:00, EventType: $statsCollected, InMemorySize: 16193.
```

Is the database corrupt? If so how can I repair it? And how can I prevent this issue?

I am using version 4.0.3.0 of the eventstore/eventstore:latest docker image.

comment.body: @xsacha was that in dockers as well? if you still have the exact error that would be helpful but don't worry if not

commits.message: Update CHANGELOG.md

Ensure not override the filter when updating a persistent subscription to all

(cherry picked from commit 9cbbbebed33bd4892ab7a837547f378d4922a895)

Conflicts in the tests resolved

Reply DoesNotExist rather than Fail when updating a Persistent Subscription to All that doesn't exist

This reinstates a behaviour that was recently changed

(cherry picked from commit f65e4943dde15f75f83342dd1aac8d6cf0c6a715)

pull_request.title: Backport 22.10: Prevent replication checkpoint from moving incorrectly on follower (DB-423)
pull_request.body:
Fixed: An way for unreplicated data to appear in a subscription or reads before being truncated

Cherry pick of https://github.com/EventStore/EventStore/pull/3972

commits.message:
Cherry pick: Prevent replication checkpoint from moving incorrectly on follower

Cherry pick of 2666ec8bb995c570d978b9a8a242629d95b2c794
Fix meta data for linked events
Fix using the wrong advertised host value in a cluster configuration.
Update the UI
Clear HeadingEventReader cache when stopping.

Merge pull request #3231 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3227/fix-linkto-metadata-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Fix linkTo metadata not properly read

Improve stream existence bloom filter V2 initialization

- Try (repeatedly) to get iterators on each table we will consume so that they can't be deleted (due to merges) while we are using them
- Derive the checkpoint from the max position we found in the index. Previously we were using tableindex.CommitCheckpoint which can be considerably behind (will be -1 if we just rebuilt the main index too)
Improve status updates during stream existence bloom filter rebuild

Cherry pick: Split builds into multiple workflows #3222

(cherry picked from commit 1933349fa4e7099bc9e99855b8b587590752d8de)

Merge pull request #3232 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3228/21.10-update-ui-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Update the UI to enable replica stats

Merge pull request #3239 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3224/fix-advertise-cluster-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Fix using the wrong advertised host value in a cluster configuration.
Ignore object disposed excpetion on shutdown

Merge pull request #3236 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3233/projections-heading-event-reader-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Clear HeadingEventReader cache when stopping

Merge pull request #3237 from EventStore/multi-workflow-21.10

Cherry pick: Split builds into multiple workflows #3222

Merge pull request #3240 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3234/merge-on-bloom-filter-initialization-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Improve stream existence bloom filter V2 initialization

Merge pull request #3246 from EventStore/cherry-pick/3242/ignore-disposed-err-release/oss-v21.10

[release/oss-v21.10] Ignore object disposed exception on shutdown

Merge pull request #3215 from thefringeninja/using-bugs

Ensure gRPC Calls are Properly Disposed

Merge pull request #3220 from EventStore/test-stability

Improve test stability

Merge pull request #3223 from renagaev/log-format-fixes

Fix log message templates

Merge pull request #3229 from EventStore/less-builds

Do not CI build for docs/samples/md

Merge pull request #3241 from EventStore/fix-psub-checkpoint-stat

Persistent Subscriptions - Set last checkpoint to last known message on load

Cherry pick: Prevent replication checkpoint from moving incorrectly on follower

Cherry pick of 2666ec8bb995c570d978b9a8a242629d95b2c794
